flexbox-based grid system

The following restrictions should be considered. To be configurable:

  • Number of columns
  • Value of breakpoints
  • The class name of the container element
  • Width of the container
  • The value of the container padding is separate for each breakpoint
  • The class name of the column element
  • The class name of the column elements is postfix(e.g.: column--mobile)
  • The padding value of the column is for each breakpoint separately
